title: celica
author: celica
content: celicafinance has Secure Data Transfer & DDOS Protected Server. Perfect Support System, Pays Every Calender Days with Fast Daily Payout and 5% Instant Affiliate Bonus.120% After 1 Day200% After 3 Days350% After 5 DaysAll transactions are handled via Tron, USDT-TRC20, USDT-ERC20, Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ether, Tether, Stellar, USD Digital, Algorand,Perfect money & Payeer ETC. All payments are made to your account shortly after making withdrawal request.Minimum spend is $10 and maximum is 150,000.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I saw that scam accusations were already made, but just for a laugh and because I want to share some of my thoughts about your site so I decided to post in this thread, looking at what's on your site:Quote from: https://celicafinance.com/ABOUTWe provide debt and equity capital directly and through funds. Investing through intermediary funds remains a key part of what we do. It allows us to reach small and medium-sized businesses across the regions we invest in. We actively challenge the businesses we invest in to meet high international standards with regard to the welfare of people, business integrity and the environment.on your website you are promising a 350% returnAfter 5 days, and the minimum investment is 1000$, so let's imagine that a person deposits 1000$ today, that means that you would have 5 days to take that 1000$ and then put it in your business and make a profit of more than 3500$ , being that on the fifth day you would give 3500$ to the investor, and you would have to keep some money to be your profit, what kind of business in this world could easily give you 350% profit in 5 days? none.and see that I just gave an example with just a single investor, if you had 3 investors knowing that each investor would invest on different days and different amounts then you would not have any chance of doing some honest business that would allow you to make a profit of more than 350 % in 5 days.My point is simple: man stop lying, your lie is so obvious and pathetic that honestly I even fear that you yourself will start believing your own lie, start doing honest business, stop with all these lies and illusions
